OrgName: IMAGE Information Systems North America LP
activities: Personal information (name, e-mail address, physical address, telephone number) is collected for legal reasons when users sign up for access to our Download Center or MANTIS users forum. Because we provide downloads to medical devices, we have legal obligations to track all medical devices provided by IMAGE according to FDA and CE medical device regulations. We also collect information when responding to a direct question, comment, or inquiry and use this information for ongoing communications regarding IMAGE and its offerings.
contactoff1: IMAGE Information Systems North America LP
personaldata: Organization, Sales Partner, Customer, Medical images. This may include manually processed data.
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
